scripts.lib: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-types
scripts.version:patch: npm run lib && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare version update" && npm version patch -m "chore: version update %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm run lib && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare version update" && npm version minor -m "chore: version update %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm run lib && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare version update" && npm version major -m "chore: version update %s" && git push && git push --tags
